name: claude-skills
description: A collection of Claude Code skills providing specialized capabilities through modular plugins.

plugins.name: openrouter
plugins.description: Invoke 300+ AI models via OpenRouter API. Use when Claude Code needs to call external models (GPT-5.2, Gemini 3, Llama, Mistral, etc.) for text completion, image generation, or model discovery.

plugins.name: readme-generator
plugins.description: Create cutting-edge README files with modern design, badges, and optional AI-generated logos via OpenRouter integration.

plugins.name: repo-logo-generator
plugins.description: Generate minimalist logos via OpenRouter with logo-optimized prompts. Use when asked to 'generate a logo' or 'create repo logo'.
